com.almasb.fxgl.texture

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • com.almasb.fxgl.texture.Texture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedTexture

    public class Texture
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
implements Disposable
    Represents a 2D image which can be set as view for an entity. The size ratio and viewport can be modified as necessary.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Constructs new texture from given image.

    • Method Detail

      • toAnimatedTexture

        public final AnimatedTexture toAnimatedTexture(int frames,
                                               javafx.util.Duration duration)
        Converts the texture to animated texture.
        Parameters:
        frames - number of frames in sprite sheet
        duration - overall duration (for all frames) of the animation
        Returns:
        new AnimatedTexture

      • toAnimatedTexture

        public final AnimatedTexture toAnimatedTexture(AnimationChannel defaultChannel)
        Converts the texture to animated texture.
        Parameters:
        defaultChannel - the default channel
        Returns:
        new AnimatedTexture

      • copy

        public final Texture copy()
        Call this to create a new texture if you are planning to use the same image as graphics for multiple entities. This is required because same Node can only have 1 parent.

        Do NOT invoke on instances of StaticAnimatedTexture or AnimatedTexture, use toAnimatedTexture(int, Duration) or toAnimatedTexture(AnimationChannel) instead.

        Returns:
        new Texture with same image

      • subTexture

        public final Texture subTexture(javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D area)
        Given a rectangular area, produces a sub-texture of this texture.

        Rectangle cannot cover area outside of the original texture image.

        Parameters:
        area - area of the original texture that represents sub-texture
        Returns:
        sub-texture

      • superTexture

        public final Texture superTexture(Texture other,
                                  javafx.geometry.HorizontalDirection direction)
        Generates a new texture which combines this and given texture. The given texture is appended based on the direction provided.
        Parameters:
        other - the texture to append to this one
        direction - the direction to append from
        Returns:
        new combined texture

      • superTexture

        public final Texture superTexture(Texture other,
                                  javafx.geometry.VerticalDirection direction)
        Generates a new texture which combines this and given texture. The given texture is appended based on the direction provided.
        Parameters:
        other - the texture to append to this one
        direction - the direction to append from
        Returns:
        new combined texture

      • toGrayscale

        public final Texture toGrayscale()
        Returns:
        grayscale version of the texture

        public final void set(Texture other)
        Set texture data by copying it from other texture.
        Parameters:
        other - the texture to copy from
